hero.title: Curated stays, experiences, and the stories behind them.

paragraphs: Indiaesque is a travel discovery platform spotlighting unique stays, independent experiences and offbeat places across India. We curate city-by-city guides designed for travellers who want more than the obvious.
India is constantly evolving — new stays open, neighbourhoods shift, and stories unfold quietly. We document what’s worth knowing, updating our guides as we discover more.

features.title: Independent Curation
features.description: We spotlight stays and experiences that stand out — not every listing in the city.

features.title: Beyond the Mainstream
features.description: From design-led stays to hidden neighborhoods, we focus on what’s less obvious.

features.title: Updated & Evolving
features.description: India never stands still. Neither do we. Our guides grow with new discoveries.
